file_content.text: So you're my hunter? Yes, yes, I see it now... the pictures don't do you justice.
Excuse my manners. Peyton Swole, Director of Galactic Relations.
Let's get down to business, director.
Keep the pleasantries short.
I enjoy a little flattery.
Hey, I don't mind compliments.
I'll keep that in mind.
I tend to have that effect on people.
Pretty great, aren't I?
You'll be a natural, I'm sure.
Thought you suits'd at least try to impress me.
When do I get my perks?
I understand you've been blasting your way through Quesh since you arrived. That's really not the image Adascorp is looking to present.
If you're endorsing our product, you'll have to take more care with your conduct.
We can discuss the terms of contractual partnership in my office. This way, please.
Make yourself comfortable. May I offer you anything?
How can I be of service to Adascorp?
Just the contract.
I was feeling a little parched.
I never turn down a drink.
Start with dinner, a vintage wine and a cute aide to rub my shoulders. I'll keep you posted.
Let me make you a list.
Valory, send in a refreshment cart... spare no expense.
No cart? Aww....
Hmm, so which one of you is Valory?
Knew I didn't like this.
Why are these things always too good to be true?
Agent Dhal, Strategic Information Service.
I'm placing you under arrest for the murders of Jedi Master Kellian Jarro and his Padawan, and for destroying the Republic cruiser Aurora.
I'm placing you under arrest for the murder of Jedi Master Kellian Jarro and the destruction of the Republic cruiser Aurora.
If you've got a problem, take it up with my employer.
I was under contract.
We plan to, after you clarify a few things. Cooperate and you might not spend the rest of your life behind bars.
You've got the wrong suspect.
If you were planning to deny the incident, you shouldn't have left an eye witness.
Slipped your mind? We've got plenty to jog your memory back on Coruscant.
Touch me, and you'll end up in a body bag.
I'd like to see you try.
We can take them.
Knight.
Uh-oh!
You spared my life; the courts will take that into consideration if you come peacefully.
Can I say I told you so yet?
Do we have to do this again?
Thendys, relieve the bounty hunter of weaponry.
Not so tough now, are we?
Tyler, disarm the bounty hunter.
Cautiously. They're a tricky bunch.
I know that too well, Master.
Come on, I spared you. Let me go and we'll call it even.
Some gratitude. Help me here.
Your mercy doesn't exonerate you.
Sorry you feel that way.
You could at least thank me.
Not well enough.
Sloppy. [Kill her.]
Thendys!
This thug isn't going anywhere, Master.
I'm gonna pretend this never happened. I suggest you do the same.
Hands off if you want to live.
Enjoying yourself, Jedi?
Think this is a joke? You won't laugh when you're doing hard labor.
I'll pass on that.
Don't make this personal.
I've had enough of you.
I'm going now.
Don't let her escape.
Don't let him escape.
Thought Jedi were supposed to be fast.
Wanna bet? [Kill him.]
Tyler!
Shoot to kill!
Hands off if you want to live.
Hands off if you want to live.
Wanna bet? [Kill him.]
Sloppy. [Kill her.]
